mapper.select: select freight.RECEIVE_CUSTOMER_VILLAGE_CODE as receiveCode, waybill.receive_customer_prov_code receiveCustomerProvCode, waybill.receive_customer_city_code receiveCustomerCityCode, waybill.receive_customer_dist_code receiveCustomerDistCode, waybill.receive_customer_address receiveCustomerAddress , waybill.waybill_no from pkp.t_srv_waybill waybill ,pkp.t_srv_actual_freight freight where freight.waybill_no=waybill.waybill_no and waybill.active = 'Y' and waybill.waybill_no=#{code,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.sql: A.ID AS ID, /** ID **/ A.VIRTUAL_CODE AS VIRTUAL_CODE, /** 虚拟编码 **/ A.TERMS_CODE AS TERMS_CODE, /** 词条代码 **/ A.TERMS_NAME AS TERMS_NAME, /** 词条名称 **/ A.VALUE_SEQ AS VALUE_SEQ, /** 序号 **/ A.VALUE_NAME AS VALUE_NAME, /** 值名称 **/ A.VALUE_CODE AS VALUE_CODE, /** 值代码 **/ A.LANGUAGE AS LANGUAGE, /** 语言 **/ A.ACTIVE AS ACTIVE, /** 是否启用 **/ A.CREATE_TIME AS CREATE_TIME, /** 创建时间 **/ A.MODIFY_TIME AS MODIFY_TIME, /** 更新时间 **/ A.CREATE_USER_CODE AS CREATE_USER_CODE, /** 创建人 **/ A.MODIFY_USER_CODE AS MODIFY_USER_CODE /** 更新人 **/
mapper.select:
select
from BSE.T_BAS_DATA_DICTIONARY_VALUE A where A.ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BSE.T_BAS_DATA_DICTIONARY_VALUE( ID, VIRTUAL_CODE, TERMS_CODE, TERMS_NAME, VALUE_SEQ, VALUE_NAME, VALUE_CODE, LANGUAGE, EXTATTRIBUTE1, NOTE_INFO, VERSION_NO, ACTIVE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATE_USER_CODE, MODIFY_USER_CODE, EXTATTRIBUTE2) VALUES ( #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{virtualCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{termsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{valueCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{language, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extAttribute1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{noteInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{versionNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{active, jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extAttribute2, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
mapper.update:
UPDATE BSE.T_BAS_DATA_DICTIONARY_VALUE A SET A.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.VIRTUAL_CODE = #{virtualCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.TERMS_CODE = #{termsCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.TERMS_NAME = #{termsName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.VALUE_SEQ = #{valueSeq, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.VALUE_NAME = #{valueName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.VALUE_CODE = #{valueCode, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.LANGUAGE = #{language, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.EXTATTRIBUTE1 = #{extAttribute1, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.NOTE_INFO = #{noteInfo, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.VERSION_NO = #{versionNo, jdbcType=DECIMAL}, A.ACTIVE = #{active, jdbcType=CHAR}, A.CREATE_TIME = #{createDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A.MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyDate, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, A.CREATE_USER_CODE = #{createUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.MODIFY_USER_CODE = #{modifyUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, A.EXTATTRIBUTE2 = #{extAttribute2, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
A.ID = #{id, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
